Articles.Content:
I have had an idea for a sort of webcomic about what happens when the sea levels rise (courtesy of danny's new world destroyer) and I was wondering if anyone would be interested in that.

I would likely use a few mods: LLL to make the base (B9 hates my computer), KAS and the lazor mod to give EVA more purpose and maybe a few others.

Also not certain if this is in the right place, if not just tell me where to move it.
